bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Criteria for Class 1E Power Systems for Nuclear Power Generating Stations
IEEE Standard Criteria for Class 1E Power Systems for Nuclear Power Generating Stations

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard applies to the Class 1E portions of the following systems and equipment in single unit and multiunit nuclear power generating stations: (1) Alternating current power systems (2) Direct current power systems (3) Vital instrumentation and control power systems (4) Protective action systems.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: IEEE Std 308-1974 (Revision of IEEE Std 308-1971 and ANSI N41.12-1975)
